title: Sylas, the ripped prisoner
body:
He sits for 15 years in prison and looks like this? LUL, perfectly shaved even. Is his magic sustaining him or what? Plus not one scar after whatever battle took place when he freed himself? What's wrong with you, Riot? You said you learned your lesson with Kai'Sa, but make the exact same mistake with Sylas. Sexualizing yet another champion, even if its in complete opposition with their character.

"We heard you..." - no Rioter ever. At least I don't believe it at this point.
